prompt: Process Alpha Bank business account statement exported as Excel format containing Greek transactions. Identify client payments, categorize expenses, detect VAT rates, and prepare reconciliation report suitable for Greek accounting firm.
expectations: Parses Alpha Bank Excel format with Greek headers and date formats
Handles Greek character encoding (Windows-1253/UTF-8) correctly
Identifies client payments using Greek keywords and patterns
Categorizes expenses according to Greek business categories
Detects VAT rates (24%, 13%, 6%) and calculates recoverable input VAT
Matches transactions to outstanding invoices with confidence scoring
Generates reconciliation report in professional Greek format
Exports data compatible with Greek accounting software

prompt: Import and reconcile statements from multiple Greek banks (Alpha Bank, NBG, Eurobank) simultaneously. Handle different file formats, detect duplicate transactions across accounts, and generate consolidated reconciliation for multi-bank Greek business.
expectations: Processes multiple Greek bank formats simultaneously (Excel, CSV, PDF)
Handles different Greek date formats and character encodings per bank
Detects and flags potential duplicate transactions across different banks
Reconciles inter-bank transfers automatically
Generates consolidated cash position report
Identifies discrepancies requiring manual review
Creates bank-specific and consolidated reconciliation reports
Integrates with Greek chart of accounts (ELSYN standards)

prompt: Process Greek bank statement with complex VAT scenarios including mixed VAT rates, EU transactions, and government payments. Calculate precise input VAT recovery and prepare VAT return data for AADE submission.
expectations: Identifies transactions with different Greek VAT rates (24%, 13%, 6%)
Handles EU reverse charge transactions correctly
Categorizes government payments (AADE, EFKA, municipal) with no VAT recovery
Calculates exact input VAT recovery amounts by rate category
Prepares VAT return data compatible with AADE submission format
Flags transactions requiring special VAT treatment
Generates comprehensive VAT analysis report
Integrates with greek-compliance-aade skill for VAT calculations

prompt: Handle Piraeus Bank CSV statement with Greek character encoding issues and irregular transaction formats. Clean data, standardize formats, and integrate with existing accounting system while maintaining audit trail.
expectations: Detects and corrects Greek character encoding problems
Handles irregular CSV formats and missing data fields
Standardizes transaction descriptions and amounts
Preserves original data for audit trail requirements
Maps transactions to existing accounting system chart of accounts
Flags problematic transactions requiring manual review
Generates data quality report with correction statistics
Maintains complete processing log for compliance

prompt: Generate comprehensive monthly banking report for Greek company management including cash flow analysis, VAT recovery summary, client payment status, and key performance indicators suitable for board presentation.
expectations: Consolidates data from all Greek bank accounts processed
Calculates key cash flow metrics and trends
Summarizes VAT recovery by category and rate
Analyzes client payment patterns and aging
Identifies key financial performance indicators
Creates professional management report in Greek
Includes actionable insights and recommendations
Provides executive summary suitable for board presentation
